law.text: A jury shall not be impaneled in any action for divorce, alimony or maintenance, but courts having general jurisdiction may grant a divorce for the cause set out in this chapter. A decree of dissolution of marriage authorizes either party to marry again.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 408, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 27. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2117, 2118.
